name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;Emma; Where are you taking me, Emily?
speak;Emily; This is an old path on the hunting trail!{w} I think I'm the only one who still uses it and I wanted to show you something.
speak;Emma; What's so important that you just had to show me all the way out here?{w} I'm tired from all this walking.
speak;Emily; Take a good look at that rabbit, Em.
speak;Emily; I want you to take my bow and try to shoot it.
speak;Emma; You know I ain't that good with a bow, Emily, but if you insist{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I doubt my archery skills have improved since last time, though.
speak;Emily; You never know until you try again, Em.
speak;Emily; Here, I'll guide your body.
speak;Emily; Move your arm like this{tgm}...{tgm}{c:wait;300} and do this pose{tgm}...{tgm}
speak;Emily; OK, breathe in and out, sharpen your focus like you do when you do magic, and then fire!
speak;Emily; Woo! See? I know you were improving, Emma! I just knew you could do it.{w} Now let's grab the rabbit and cook the spoils of our hunt.
speak;Emily; I've got my equipment with me to do it.{w} We can stargaze together here tonight!
speak;Emma; Was this the plan the whole time?{w} To keep me out here to watch the stars together?
speak;Emma; Heh, well I'd love to, but do you think we can leave the village behind for a day?

speak;Emily; I know our mother will try to stop us,{w} but if it means we can get out of that suffocating little village for a day,{w} get out here, and see the world with you, I don't care about the consequences.
speak;Emma; What{tgm}...{tgm} What the fuck was that?!{w} Emily, take your bow and get ready to shoot. I don't like the looks of this{tgm}...
speak;Emma; That eye thing{tgm}...{tgm}{c:wait;300} I-It just latched itself onto that corpse{tgm}...{tgm}{w} We need to get out of here and go home, NOW!
speak;Emily; We can't. Those things are blocking our path out of here{tgm}...{tgm}{w} It looks like we'll need to fight our way back.
